summary: This Pack will make all the glass weapons look brighter to enhance their look
descriptionHtml:
Brighter Glass Weapons

this pack has all of the weapons that are made from glass
and have enhanced colours so that they stand out more so 
they look better in my opinion

install:
place the data folder in you skyrim directory normally found
at c:/program file/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

accept any popups that appear so that it copies the files correctly.

uninstall:
remove the glass file from the textures file within the data folder.

thanks for the download have fun>

Akrio
author: Akrio
